text: I'm in the ER, so I'm going to take tomorrow to recover and follow up with my doctor, hope to see you Friday!
Oh no, please let us know if we can do anything Marissa!!
Thanks Jenna! I'm under great care, will be fine

Hi all, there's a bunch of people on our team who haven't logged a timesheet in the past month. Please go in and double check Harvest in the morning to make sure you're all caught up. Thank youuuuu! Also, CONGRATS ON MAKIN' IT TO CODE FREEZE!!! :raised_hands:
I'm so sorry to hear that Marissa, please please take care of yourself.
